content.detailedDescription: I have a habit of going outside my house with my dogs at night. i also always look at the stars. this one night i happen to look straight up checking out the milkyway. just then i noticed a small object. i thought it was a satelite going from east to west. it was yellow but darker more like a tan color. it was oval in shape. as i watched it going past the milkyway it sudenly lit up like it was burning up in the atmosphere. then just as sudenly it stopped burning all the wile still moving. it started to fade away as it moved. it lasted about 16 seconds with the burn about 8 seconds in. i went in to call my son. he came out but it was still gone. he laughed at me and went in. i was still looking when it faintly came back into view down rang. the object didn't stay long dimming out again in about 6 second with no fire this time. it never changed coarse. i have a feeling it was a larg meteor that didn't make it into the attmosphere. never heard any other news about it.
content.summary: High object with  fireball

content.detailedDescription: I have a habit of going outside my house with my dogs at night. i also always look at the stars. this one night i happen to look straight up checking out the milkyway. just then i noticed a small object. i thought it was a satelite going from east to west. it was yellow but darker more like a tan color. it was oval in shape. as i watched it going past the milkyway it sudenly lit up like it was burning up in the atmosphere. then just as sudenly it stopped burning all the wile still moving. it started to fade away as it moved. it lasted about 16 seconds with the burn about 8 seconds in. i went in to call my son. he came out but it was still gone. he laughed at me and went in. i was still looking when it faintly came back into view down rang. the object didn't stay long dimming out again in about 6 second with no fire this time. it never changed coarse. i have a feeling it was a larg meteor that didn't make it into the attmosphere. never heard any other news about it.
content.summary: High object with  fireball

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were leaving from a christmas party in south austin.  we were driving north,north west on slaughter lane just east of the mopac 1 expressway.  as i was driving i noticed 5 to 6 what appeared to be large orange stars.  they were in the formation of the big dipper and they appeared to be many miles ahead of us maybe 10+, but i couldn't be sure.  i immediately asked my wife if she saw them and if they were planes or something else, but she said she had also been watching them, but just thought they were planes or something.  as i watched them i new they weren't stars because they were to big and very orange in color and they weren't moving and just stationary.  i told my wife i had to stop to look and i was on a pretty busy street so i sped up and turned into a residential neighborhood.  i quickly got out of the car and as we pulled into the neighborhood they had moved and were directly above us.  by the time i got out of the car 2-3 of them were gone.  the other three had moved closer together next to another one that did not ever move (the 4h).  2 of them then started to move in different directions and slowly faded away.  when there were two left a car pulled up with a family of 5 and asked me if i new what i was looking at because they had been watching it from their home and they didn't know what they were.  i told them i didn't know what they were, but they definitely weren't stars, a plane or a helicopter.  i then remembered that i had a video and digital camera in my car and ran to get it ,but the digital wouldn't take the photo because it couldn't focus.  at this point  one of the other lights begin to move and it then slowly fades away while the one single light remained motionless in the air.  i then told my wife to run and get the video camera and right as i turned the camera on the last orange ball of light disappeared in a quick fade.  it was pretty exciting to see this and i'm not sure what it was, but it had to be some type of secret military thing or a true ufo or ufos.  feel free to contact me if you have any questions.

i have to say, i was very disappointed that i didn't get any of this on video, but it was very exciting to see it.  i felt like i was in some ufo movie or something.
content.summary: 5 to 6 orange balls of light

content.detailedDescription: My son and i came home from shopping for pet supplies at walmart, we got out of my jeep cherokee that i had parked in our driveway in front of our single car garage, my son opened the back hatch of the jeep, he and i then grabbed the supplies from the back of the jeep, leaving the hatch open, because i had to come back and get the last of the supplies. we took off heading towards the house, my son was about 5 feet ahead of me. he was walking along side of the house's garage's side walk,  looking up in a western direction, at that point he stated to me, "what the heck is that?", do you see it? what is it?" i heard him and glanced up to where he was pointing but did not see anything, leaving him still looking up,i was really in a rush to get in the house and get settled in and relax ,not really caring so much at that moment as to what he seen. once i  unlocked the door of the house i asked him what was it that he seen? he told me it looked like a hat, i was sceptical as to what he actually thought it was he had seen. i dropped off my supplies and headed back to the car. the car was facing a west to northwest direction in the driveway, as i was grabbing the pet supplies by the handles in the back of the vehicle. the hatch at this time was still in an upright open position.   i began staring upwards through the glass of the vehicles back hatch. the glass is factory smoked and inhanced the night sky, i saw a dark shadow, its size was about 1 and 1/2 inches in width, it was in the upper left hand corner of the hatches glass, i noted this because it was darker than the glass and sky's color, i thought it was a dirty spot on the glass and it looked like an upside down hat, then, remembering what my son seen i slowly looked around the hatch,while keeping a constant visual on the object, now, looking at this object straight on in the western sky, it was a dark mass, darker then the night's sky. i stared at the dark silloutte in the sky for about 45 seconds, then, it started to move in an eastern direction where it looked like it flew over the house and behind the tree, where, in reality, it was around 1 and 1/2 to 2 miles west from my garages roof top where i at that time lost sight of the unknown object when it flew behind the tree. at this point, i went in the house after i locked up the car and grabbed the supplies i had earlier purchased. i then asked my son to draw what he seen, he told me that hes "not a great artist" i then told him to try and draw it as best  he can. i had drawn mine prior to this, and when i saw his drawing it looked exactly like mine,only difference being mine was in an upside down position opposite of the position of his. at this point i became stunned realizing that we had, in fact witnessed the exact same thing! my son is 13 years old, in the 7th grade in school a a and b student and very mature for his age. both of us are sure that we definitely witnessed something that night that is inexplicable and not anything that is of our skies that is a normal phenomenam. this object was seen in jefferson county, littleton, colorado west of kipling blvd, and south west of bellview ave.
content.summary: Tilted hat shape

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting in a dentist office i saw the objects through the large windows of the waiting room. i was sitting, looking out through the windows, when i saw it above the building across the parking lot in front of me. i initially thought it was a stacked group of 2 or 3 parachutes, but i thought it was odd that they were parachuting at that location. the location is just east of the air force academy which has a lot of parachute operations, but nowhere near where i saw this object. after looking at it a few seconds, trying to process what i was seeing, i notice it wasn't coming down, but was moving horizontally and that it actually didn't exactly look like linked parachutes. i then started thinking "what the heck is that?". it went behind a raised part of the roof of the building, moving from right to left. i started watching the other side of the raised section to see if it would emerge on the same trajectory, when approximately 5 white lights emerged in an arc shape, moving right to left at about the same speed as the first object. as the arc of 5 or so lights moved left the arc was expanding very slowly, it appeared that they were climbing and moving directly away from me. also, while the arc of lights was expanding, two more objects (lights) appeared and did the same as the arc of lights. they were moving so slowly that they appeared to be almost hovering, but they were getting smaller and smaller, which made me think they were moving away. 
i think the total duration of viewing was about 5 minutes. i was watching them slowly get smaller, or dimmer, when we were called in to see the dentist. 
later that day i flew out of the air force academy's aeroclub working on my single engine land airplane rating, into the same area that i saw the objects. i have 5900 hours of helicopter time, and have never before seen anything that i couldn't explain. the whole time i was watching this object however, i was trying to figure out what i was seeing, but couldn't come up with anything that could explain this. at the aeroclub i checked notices to airmen (notams) to see if any kind of unusual operations were happening that day, but no one knew anything. the area is also in the northern part of the colorado springs airport class c airspace. i never check with approach control though, to see if they saw anything.
content.summary: Object(s) seen during daytime, initially parachute shaped, after passing behind a building appeared to become an arc of  lights.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of aug 10 1997 i was watching tv when the phone rang and it was my friend he told me to go outside and look up in the sky so i did and i was ashtonished at what i saw. this thing flew very close to the roof of my house i counted 13 individual lights on the bottom of this boomerang shaped triangular craft i could not even here its engines or any thing. i watched for a good fifteen minutes and then out of no where the craft took off at an incredible rate of speed after hovering.  i dont know what to think of this?
content.summary: Trianglish boomerang 13 lights silent craft was huge

content.detailedDescription: I worked at a daycare during this time. everyday myself and my co-teacher would take the 2 and 3 year olds outside to play. it was a little after 11:00a.M. we looked up in the sky to the southwest of us and there was this ball of fire hovering in the sky. it was not moving at all...Just sitting there. it was not that high up either. not as high as a plane would be, just above the treeline. we kept staring and even a few of the children pointed and said "fire". i had never seen anything like it. it was not a plane, it had no material to support it was any type of spacecraft. finally, after roughly 3 minutes it took off at about a 45 degree angle and vanished. i have never seen anything like it in my life and neither had my co teacher.
content.summary: Fireball in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
14 august 2009 myself and a hunting partner drove up the dalton highway to hunt caribou.  we hiked in 2.5 miles off the dalton highway close to happy valley, we hiked in on the west side of the road.  we each broght one man tents and stayed out three nights, shooting two caribou each. on the four day we started out with the first load, when we made it to the truck my toes and part of my foot was numb, both feet were like that.  i told my hunting partner i've never had my toes go numb before and he said his toes and feet where the same way. we both just put on a spare set of boots we brought ate and crashed out.  when we got the last of the caribou out and headed home not thinking much about it.  
at home i noticed that on each of my big toes i had a small red mark as in the photo.  today my big toe and the one next to it are mumb the rest of the foot is normal.  my hunting partner has the same marks on his toes and his big toe and next one are numb too.
tell you the truth i have no idea what happened.  are boots were two different kinds and good boots.  we just woke up and our feet where half numb and when we got home we found red marks on our big toes, all four marks are in the same place on each toe.  we saw no one on the hunt. i watch the ufo hunters each week and figured this maybe an encounter.  i'm at a lost to what happen just figured you guys might like to record the event.
content.summary: One mark on each big toe, two of us.

content.detailedDescription: I was about 14 years old, living in the country with my mother.  i had a boyfriend that lived in the next neighborhood.  i snuck out one night to go see him, and on my way home, i felt like some one was watching me.  i got the chills and decided to look around to see if i could find anyone watching me.  i followed the "feeling" of being watched, and ended up looking toward the sky.  at first i didn't see anything, but after my eyes had adjusted to the darkness, i noticed a dark triangle in the sky, where the stars did not shine through.  after watching it for a moment, i noticed it was actually just barely above the tree line.  i was overcome with fear, and the sense that some one was seriously looking at me.  i ran home as quickly as i could, and when i turned to see it again, it silently took off over the trees. they moved in a breeze, but i never heard the sound of an engine or anything.  the next day, my mom said there were people out at the ranch asking questions about ufo's.  i didn't speak up for fear of getting grounded for sneaking out....
content.summary: Silent black triangle hovering

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving kensington metro park and as i was about to turn i noticed two cars pulled over with the people standing outside of it looking skywards. as i was making my turn i glanced up to see what they were looking at and seen a gray metallic shaped ufo sitting stationary in the sky about the same altitude as the jets do when they make there approach to pontiac oakland airport. i wheeled back around and immediately got out of my car and started to stare at it for about three minutes not beleiving my eyes. there is no doubt in my mind it was a ufo. it was not a ballon or a plane or a helecopter. it did not move up, down or sideways. it remained moitionless for about 3 minutes and then started to go up at a slow rate. i had my camera with me because i always go to the park to photograph wildlife pictures. i snapped off 4 pictures.
i have told a few relitives and others about this and they act if i am nuts. i have the 4 pictures to prove it. the ufo in the pictures appear smaller than what i remember it to look like in size. look at the enclosed pictures but do zoom in on them and see for yourself. i stared at this thing thinking that there probably was some kind of intelligent life onboard and here i am staring at it. after about 6-7 minutes, it gained altitude and got smaller so i went home in a hurry to get these oictures on my computer  to show to people.
content.summary: It was stationary up in the sky for about 3 minutes and then it started to go higher up

content.detailedDescription: I along with my two friends were driving to the store,(i was the driver, coop was a passenger sitting behind me, and fee was the front seat passenger) when my friend coop tapped me on the shoulder, and said," hump what is that ?!". i looked and i replied, "man that's just a plane." coop again pleaded, "no, man that's no plane, what is it?" i looked again, this time slowing down in the car to get a better look. that's when i noticed that it was not a plane at all. i saw an object that had white lights going all the way across the front of it. at this time we all became very excited. we arrived at the 7-11, located on sherwood rd., in baltimore city, and we continued to observe the object, as it was descending towards us. i was so intrigued about this strange object, that i almost ran straight into the 7-11 building itself. i threw the car into park, and we all got out of the car and left the doors opened, because we were so excited. as we exited the car, we had noticed the object had spun around as to fly in another direction, as it did this, the object flew directly over top of us. this object was black(matte)in color, rectangled shaped, no markings on it or any noticeable markings of any kind. it was also very large and had what looked like a door on the bottom, with a bright blue light emminating from it. as the object passed over us, i had noticed that there was no sound of any kind coming from it, and that it had no exhaust or engines in the back of it. we all watched as the object slowly disappeared over several houses in the area. the strange thing about this event is that i don't know why it seemed that we were the only ones to have witnessed this event on this particular night, and the fact that my passenger fee didn't believe in ufos until this strange event had happened to us. to this day i can't get that night out of my mind, because i know in my heart that the object we saw was from another planet. i know it was not a govermental experiment because if the government has been hiding the truth all of these years, they would not subject citizens of this country with aircraft that could create mass hysteria!!
content.summary: The object had lights all across the front, and a portal on bottom with blue light.

content.detailedDescription: It was early fall of 97.  me an my wife an our daughter were leaving family home. lookout valley ga.Heding home to ringold ga. when i got hwy196 red light i saw bright light above the ridge.I told my wife to look .Her aplie was o thats lights from ball feild .Was agood answer but the lights were the wrong side.As i crossed hwy began to tell her to shut up.As we drove uo the ridge i began turn off everthing.I pulled over in the middle of hwy.I was in shock at size of it,i had my head out the window looking up.No sound was made.Ithad a beam of light coming from the bottom that lightup 3 or 4 tree tops.Nothing moved not a sound was made.This was a mind blowing moment of my life,my life has changed forever.Did not say anything to anyone for a week.I expected to see something on the news for this is a small towne.Nothing was mentioned about this at all.The follwing weekend i was at family's home when i could not hold it in no longer.I began to tell my brothering law what i had seen the weekend before.Before i could finish he explained everthing i was going to tell him he had saw 3 nights later over same ridge.That blowed my mind that he saw the same thing.The only way i can explain what i saw just unbelevable.Something out of starwars.
content.summary: As large as a football feild  hovering over a ridge 150 yards above my car

content.detailedDescription:
I remember this i worked for the dot and 495 and southhaven park was part of my turf. i saw a machine i never ever saw in my life it had a hydrolic arm that grabed the tree another hydrolic arm had a saw that cut the tree at ground level and the arm that grabed the tree would feed it into a chipper all one unit machine, it cut a path about 3 lanes... wide right into the park in no time . remember this is protected land haha yeah right. i saw this happening and was like what the [cms/tg/pd] is this.... they made a tempary bridge over the river somthing like the arm would do. the ufo they took out of the park was huge and intact it took off the top of the trees when it crashed. and they took it down the lie 495 at night time closed down the highway to a grumans hanger in riverhead. the men in black treatened the yapank firemen that responded and a few people that lived in the area that saw it, that if they opened there mouths them and there love ones will pay the price !!!! this never happened 

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=pmemg33vzqq
content.summary: Long island november 1992

content.detailedDescription: I was home alone on september 1, 2009 when i heard something on my roof.  i live in a one story house with a garage and partial basement below, built into the side of a hill.  very secluded and wooded with a pond in the backyard.  there is no way that this could be lights from a vehicle in the neighborhood, because there are none, no neighborhood except maybe 1,000 feet away through the woods there are other houses, but no way to see lights on my back porch umbrella, which is where i saw them.  i was scared  because i knew that it was something unheard of.  it landed like a big clunk on my roof.  i was coming out of the bedroom from putting my pajamas on and it landed directly over my bedroom/kitchen area.  they are next to each other.  i went back in the bedroom and looked out of my bedroom window which faces east and is over the garage.  there was nothing there.  then i went to the kitchen window and looked out.  on my large umbrella, which was on my porch in the back of the house, i saw lights going around so that it made the umbrella appear to be twirling around, and very bright.  i was unsure what was going on until after it was all over.  there was no noise, absolute silence.  i was so scared that i called the police to come out and see if it was still there.  it had to be reasonably small because my house has an antennae on one side and a pipe for the bathroom on the other side.  my house is only 1,100 sq. feet.  the police came out with flashlights and their car lights, and i turned on the porch flood light too, but it was gone, thankfully.  i noticed some days later that all of my gas equipment was empty, a generator, lawnmower, leaf blower and snow blower.  all empty.  also, peculiar as it was, but a 100 foot extension cord and a rope were wrapped very tightly in small loops separately.  the extension cord was in the garage on the floor and the rope was over on the wall in the garage and both had been arranged in small loops.  go figure.  also, the car washers for my prius didn't work.  it appeared to be empty too, but it was over half full when i checked it.  it started working when i checked the fluid level.  go figure that.  later that night i called my friend about 70 miles away and she had another friend over who got a phone call from her son telling her she should see the lights over sand lake.  they were moving at unbelieveable speeds.  sand lake is about 55 miles from me.  this was all in the same night.  i didn't know you guys existed or i would have gotten ahold of you sooner.  then about a month later, the police called me and wanted to know if i would talk to somebody in new york city named daryl pitt about what i had seen.  he is a "meteor tracker" and said that meteors were in the area that night.  i waited for his call which came a few minutes later, and i told him this was no meteor, but a ufo.  he agreed with me.
content.summary: Something landed on my house.  i was inside and turned off all lights.

content.detailedDescription: As i left my house headed for work i drove north on golden meadow road in greenwood, louisiana. i could see a cross shaped object above the road ahead. i thought it may be a helicopter and thought it was very low. it had lights all bright white up and down and multicolored lights on the crossbar. it was low enough and bright enough to light up the trees and foliage on either side of the road. it made no noise. i was afraid to drive under it but had to to get to work. i drove under the object and it hovered there without any sound. i watched it in my rear view mirror and it was still there as i drove out of sight.
content.summary: Multi colored cross hovered over roadway

content.detailedDescription:
I already did this... (?)

for the answes below, please remember i am answering for two separate events. one very far (singular craft with three white lights and one red, at about commercial jet landing pattern alt. (?)) and one very near (5-7) white triangles, very high speed, very low alt.)
content.summary: I already did this... (?)

content.detailedDescription:
Saw a yellow circle with red around it, which seemed to be not moving, looked very high up, but when looking at the stars (on a very clear night) the object was considerably larger than the stars.

it then seemed to move back into the night sky as the red started to disappear and the yellow got smaller until it completely disappeared.

this was seen by my myself, my daughter and her friend. there was also a group of youths aged approx. 14yrs upwards who watched it.

this is unlike anything i have ever seen before.

kind regards 

lucie mackay
content.summary: Bright yellow glow with red outer colour much bigger than the stars

content.detailedDescription: At about 7:00pm ��� 7:10pm, my wife and i were sitting in the living room; i got up to make a call but all of the phones in the house were not working. we went outside for a cigarette. it was dark outside and overcast. i live in a small suburb community a couple of miles from town, there are not a lot of street lights around here, so the street is not well lit. one strange thing that we noticed was that all of the dogs in the neighborhood were barking. we first saw the object to the right of us. at first the object was an intense neon blue light, bar shaped at first. the object would hover and cruse just below the overcast clouds line circling us, flying slowly and changing altitudes. its movements were smooth quiet and squared. the light would change its shape, having a few different light patterns on the craft. when the craft seemingly noticed us it put on a display of unnatural and impossible maneuvers; moving from a dead stop to unimaginable speeds in an instant, making 90 degree turns at high speed, then coming to a complete stop, all the while moving without a sound. i told my wife to get the camera so we could take a picture. she ran into the house to grab the camera but every time we tried to take a picture the craft would pulse and the battery power would be drained. then we would mess with the camera and it would come back on with battery power but when we tried to take the picture again, the same thing would happen. finally when the craft was at its furthest points away from us we could get a shot of it, three in total. when we captured it, the craft would react. with the first snapshot, the flash failed to flash, and the craft returned and put on a display of its maneuvers, then continued to circle us. the second snapshot again with no flash. the craft came right in front of us, banked its angle and exposed its shape to us. all i could tell was that it was pure black with blue lights. the bar light turned into several individual lights fading off and on. i could see that it was triangle in shape. i couldn���t easily see the shape because the craft was dark and i was too focused on the lights. then the ship would again start to circle us. still when the craft was close to us it would turn our camera off. so my wife handed me the camera to see if i could get it to work when my wife screamed, ���o my god look at that!��� i looked up at the craft; it had a beam of light going to the ground with a red orb returning to the ship. i didn���t get to see the whole event with the orb because i was looking at the camera but my wife witnessed the whole thing. the orb returned to the craft and it began circling again. i gave the camera back to her she got the third picture; the best one. the third time the camera flashed. the craft turned to face us and closed the gap of distance from where it had been, to where we were. it sat just above the neighbor���s house. we were looking at what i believed to be the front of the craft. the craft fired a pulse of light towards us and i could feel a surge travel through my whole body, and my car was popping as if the sheet metal was warping. then the craft began to circle again. we noticed that the phones were now working again and i was able to talk to my parents and franticly tried to explain to them what was happening. i thought we can���t be the only ones to see this so i ran across the street to get the neighbors outside to see this as well. i knew they were home and i could hear them in there. i was franticly knocking on the door and ringing the door bell, but no one would answer. soon enough a car was pulling down the street it was my wife���s mom. we yanked her out of the car to see it. then three minutes after she arrived home, the craft was gone. it disappeared in the overcast clouds. after all of this excitement i noticed that where the craft was flying it had opened a hole in the thick overcast clouds that took a few minutes to fill back in, revealing the night sky above. in total the event lasted about 30 ��� 40 minutes. this has been a very emotional event for me and my wife. we both had bad migraine headache for the next two days and my life has been permanently changed.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 30 - 40 min interaction with a triangle craft

content.detailedDescription:
I first noticed the craft soon after sitting down to christmas dinner. it was an extremely clear day with visibility out to at least 50 miles. it was quite bright outside as a result of the clear skies. out of the corner of my eye, i saw something silver-colored and highly reflective. it looked metallic. it was 4-6 miles out, and somewhere between 1000 and 1500 feet. keep in mind these are estimates. they were made the day after the sighting after reviewing local maps.

what struck me initially was that the shape and reflectiveness made me think "airplane," but the crafts' leisurely low speed bank then brought me to "helicopter." i watched the craft intently for a few seconds, trying to compare what i was seeing to anything else i had ever seen. i noted the absence of wings and helicopter blades. there was also an absence of sound. i feel the lack of sound is an important point because aircraft regularly fly in and around the chehalem valley and are audible inside the house with he windows closed. 

i also noticed that the entire shape of the craft was not immediately discernible. the craft was so reflective that part of the craft was always obscured by glare. i could see however, that the craft had a rounded shape with either end looking roughly similar. the glare/reflectiveness seemed to move across the craft as a sort of slow pulse. the glare sort of looked like an intermittent silver doughnut or ovoid sphere pulsing around the craft. kind of. again i have no basis for comparison.

after about 5-6 seconds i looked around the dinner table to see if anyone was looking where i was. no one had looked outside and everyone else was engrossed in conversation. i decided against telling everyone to look out the window because i figured i was just looking at a silver airplane from a weird angle. then i realized the sun was on roughly the opposite side of the craft from the silver glare/reflectiveness. i quickly looked back out the window after no more than 1-2 seconds and the craft was gone. then i had a sinking feeling, like a sense of dread. no aircraft i have ever seen could have moved out of my field of view that quickly. i could simply see too much of the valley for an aircraft to leave my field of view that quickly.
content.summary: Slow moving highly reflective possibly flashing rounded craft was seen briefly then dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
This was taken from a caller, report summitted by dispatch

high tension wires behind aunts trailers orange ball of light appeard and when it got near the wires it accellerated in speed.
content.summary: Orange balls in sky

content.detailedDescription: It was november 7th of 2009.  the view of the mountains by the kitchen window was magnificent.  the snow was covering the top of the mountains that i see and love everyday.  i took my camera outside my backyard and took some pictures, before the snow started melting.  when i started seeing the pictures i took,  i notice a sharp glowing object with it's shadow underneath my feelings were that only a camera captures anything out of the ordinary that we humans are not capable of seeing.  to me the shade under the light was a flying object and the light that the camera captures  was some kind of radiation from the flying object.
content.summary: Bright light with a shadow under

content.detailedDescription: Saw first two orange orbs, outside of work place in the heart of filey, moving at high speed towards the sea direction. witnessed it with my boss and his wife whilst having a cig outside. was previously phoned by a friend to look out for them as he and his dad saw them on there way home from work. the two objects disapeared but one first changed direction and shot up into the sky. second event a few hours later at my familys christmas party, again outside in the garden having a cig. this time my brother in-law and his daughter watched as 7-9 objects again moved fast through the sky, heading towards the sea. these did not dissapear but rather moved out of view behind the tops of houses. apprently earlier someone had set of three chinese lanterns in a near by village. its possible i suppose but there were no flickering lights and they were moving dam fast and in a sort of formation. also i have just heard something about the us  airforce testing flares or something last night? in filey? i used to be in the army and boy, flares have really come on leaps and bounds since then! in my humble opinion they were not flares or lanterns. i have also seen a few months back two white orbs, as bright as venus but again moving at some speed, they to dissapeared. i tried to take a picture of one last night and just caught it, but it is not prove positive regretably. i would like to know who many other people withnessed these objects last night because it was spooky!
content.summary: Two bright orange spheres, star like, moving fast. later 7 to 9 of them

content.detailedDescription: I was attending a nhra drag race & sleeping in the parking lot on the ground when i looked up & saw this triangle with 7 lights evenly spaced going overhead going straight south towards wichita ks. the lights were dim & evenly spaced one at the apex & 3 on each side, the triangle was only about 10 or 15 degrees, i do not know how high the clouds were the distance between the lights from side to side would be far wider the the wing span on the largest plane i have ever seen. i watched it for about 3 min,until it faded out. it was moving fairly slowly. i have always wondered if i was the only person to see this.
content.summary: Shallow triangle with 7 dim lights above thin clouds no sound

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting at our patio table with my wife tish and grandson logan, i was looking to the north east at the cloud formation when i saw something flashing against the large cloud in  the background.
  i watched for about a minute, then told the others who had their backs to it, they turned to observe the object also, i then decided to go to the basement and get my bionaculars with built in camera.
  when i returned i saw that the object had moved to the southwest of us and just to the north of mcconnell afb. which is to our south.
we were thinking it might have to do with the military, i talked with a confidental source from the base and was told there was no military action they knew takeing place. even with the optical aid i could see no definition to the object it was just smooth and round, i then remembered to photograph it.
i felt that the object must be powered because it was traveling into the wind. at least the wind on the ground was from that direction.
the object seemed to stay in that spot for about 5min then went up into a cloud formation and dissapeared. we watched until the cloud passed and there was nothing. even useing the bionaculars i could not locate it.
  i told my wife i found that odd because it was about the same time frame in 1958 that my mother father and i saw a similar object just about fifty feet from our house which traveled west then abruptly changed directions went over our house and dissapeard into the distance. that object pulsated with light and was about 75 feet in diameter.
content.summary: Observed object traveling south west photographed.

content.detailedDescription:
I was the southeast corner of my brother's house on foot and noticed a fast moving object from the northeast toward the southwest. i followed it from its emergence at the tree line approximately 8 degrees above the horizon, on this course until it dissappeared in the southwest at the tree line which was approximately 15 degrees above the horizon. this was the summer of 1958.

my first reaction (probably in miliseconds) was that a missle test had gone awry, and i was seeing a "loose missle". but then i waited for the sound of a rocket motor or some kind of propulsion method and there was none. just silence. there was no contrail either. but what really stood out in my mind was the lack of airfoils of any kind or size. i thought it might be an airplane in a slight bank so that i was seeing it wing-on. but then there was no vertical stabilizer or rudder of any kind. during the entire 8 seconds i observed the flight of this craft i noted that it did not seem to be on a crash course with the ground.

i had earned my wings in the g.O.C. (ground observer corps) and had a manual furnished by the air force which identified by 3-views and sometimes pictures, every known aircraft flying at the time. my station was 12 echo, an enclosed structure on the roof of the high school building in smithtown, long island, new york. we had a direct telephone link to what was then mitchell field at roosevelt, long island near hempstead. i put in 12 to 16 hours per week and we had to identify every sighting of anything in the sky such as location in relation to 12 echo, altitude, direction of flight path, approximate speed, any delay in the speed of reporting, number of motors or propulsion means, date and time, etc. i felt i knew the manual pretty thoroughly. i also knew of our latest missles such as the snark, bomark, nike, and later, the nike zeus, etc. i guess what i'm saying is that i was not a stranger to being critically detailed in knowing what was in the sky at any given time. but i had never seen anything like what i observed on that june afternoon.

it may be of interest to note that i did not think i had observed a ufo for a number of years after this event. i just had to live with an experience for which i had no explaination.

on long island at the time we had grumman aviation and republic, also sperry gyroscope, and other defense companies, some of which were getting into jet aircraft and we experienced several crashes. as a 1st. lt. in the smithtown squadron of civil air patrol i had been on a number of sarcaps (search and rescue civil air patrol)involving some of these test flight accidents. 

i lost sight of the object as its flight path crossed over the tree line. it was cigar shaped, grey metallic, following a straight course, and was definitely not a meteor. i have never reported this to anyone but friends because i didn't think it would be of interest to anyone. however, recently i have seen some of the t.V. programs related to mufon and i thought i would make the above report to see if it is of any interest to you. anyway, keep up your good work.
content.summary: Saw grey metallic missle without airfoils or aerodynamic surfaces travelling northeast to southwest.At high speed.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my family where driveing the back roads home when my daughter saw a orange fire colored ball floating over and around the trees like it was looking for something.It moved very slow and was very bright.In blink it was gone and reapear 50 a hundred feet from where it just was.We watched it for about 20 mins and then i started driving home as they watched the light on the moutain.It was deffantly weird to see the lght where there arent any roads and cars and trucks can not float above trees.Yes it is a loggin raod but where this light was there ant no roads.
content.summary: Floated over and around trees

content.detailedDescription: I was filming in my back yard what i thought was a black contrail and caught something else.  pointing wsw about 4:30 pm dusk, 12-24-2009.  it was difficult to get the camera to focus because it was so cold outside and that seems to cause problems with the focus on the camera.  i didn't actually realize i had caught anything else until i was loading it up on my computer. i didn't think it was normal for a plane to maneuver in front of another plane this way.
content.summary: Fly by of commercial airliner.

content.detailedDescription: Large circular object behind the sun it moved 4 times as i took the photos had a rainbow effect on the whole sky....Might have been snow falling downward to earth but i doubt it.Anyway it was up there for 17 mins. then disappeared has me concerned. please get back to me be glad to show you the photos.
content.summary: In the sky right above me as i was dispatching cars for the manheim auto auction....It appeared out of no where and was large very large i took photos using my ipod camera
